#summary Listing some of the features of the system

= User Experience =

  * Simple straighforward layout
  * Focused on content (cat show photos)  

= What's included =

  * instant find as you type based on real time partial string matching
  * a detailed search engine for advanced users

= What's excluded =

  * forums, user comments, ratings (this is not a user community portal)

= Feature details = 
 
   * URLs shouldn't use GET parameters
   * URL to a photo should also be a permanent URL
